content: I never turn my camera on. Working from home means not having to dress in business casual.
Ah, but you're such a charming personality! Show it!

If anyone else is using Google Meet to fill the void, I highly recommend this plugin: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/google-meet-grid-view/bjkegbgpfgpikgkfidhcihhiflbjgfic . It gives you a pretty sweet brady bunch experience.

There is an equivalent plugin for Firefox too that works well.
@David Pyke Come on, you can't fool us, we know you don't get to the "in business casual" part.
I'm always at least in a bath robe. I don't want to traumatize people by having them accidentally see what lies under it.
